name:Lâ€aâ€nâ€dâ€oâ€ â€Fâ€uâ€nâ€g
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in February 2024
info:Couples
info:2 Reviews
rating:2.5
posted:Posted March 7, 2024
msg:I think the up in Regent Hotel is only the service in two restaurants (Daccapo Italian Restaurant and Jinbao 99), we had a course dinner in Daccapo, and Hotpot set in Jinbao 99. The service and atmosphere in Daccapo were fine, and the taste of the foods was amazing, especially the buns and desserts,(but the so-called Boston lobster linguine with truffle was not worth it as added RMB $150). Also, the buffet breakfast was great in JinBao 99(the Hotpot set for dinner was just fair I think), all of the food was not bad, and the service was good, especially the supervisor Ms Doreen, who is friendly and talkative. Hopefully, they can keep it on.
The downs are the rooms, and the services in reception, swimming pool and lobby. The room was quite outdated, and the most unacceptable and super crazy was you couldn't adjust the room temperature to below 24 Celsius, really hot and stuffy, and we couldn't sleep well all the nights we stayed, though opened up the windows(I never opened up the windows in a hotel until this time), but we didn't know where the heating comes from, still keeps warm and stuffy. Also, we called for one more chair, and they sent a chair which was quite filthy, with all the dust in it(you can see the pics). The service in lobby reception and the pool was poor, they had "bad face" all the time, no smiles, to be honest, the pool itself is not bad, but some people who use the pool which is not the hotel guest and no service in the pool and wellness area.  Also, we talked to the lobby receptionist about the problems in the room, she said they would sort it out for us but finally they did nothing about it, obviously, she lied to us. 
When we checked out, I told the manager about this, she said all the hotels in Beijing are the same regarding the heating problem, but I want to tell her, it doesn't, at least Four Seasons doesn't. And the room is much better than the Regent Hotel.
All in all, just fair, not the global 5-star standard, hopefully, they can rebuild or renew the rooms, and improve the services.

info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in November 2023

info:2 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted November 10, 2023
msg:Absolutely amazing time here and so much of it was thanks to the most amazing person ever - Paolo. Before I even checked in the bell hop helped me with the luggage and check in was so smooth. Everyone was so welcoming and warm that I immediately felt happy and bubbly. The room was so thoughtfully prepared to welcome me on my birthday and to make me feel special. There was even a small cake, a fruit platter, and a personalized card. I was absolutely blown away by the level of personalized care and attention to detail. We had some tea at the executive lounge and again were welcomed and had great service. Paolo arranged for some more personalized touches for my birthday party in the lounge including Barbie themed photos on the appetizers and bite sized snacks. He was able to help us with the theme of the birthday party ~ Barbie by designing four different pink cocktails including a gin tonic style drink and a bubbly prosecco based one. We also had the breakfast buffet which had a great selection of food and was separated from the dining tables which was appreciated to better enjoy the food. I really liked the noodle and soup station in the morning especially as it was raining. The butterfly brunch was lovely and very fulfilling. I have nothing but an endless number of positive things to say about my sumptuous room with mesmerizing views and tremendous service. I love staycations and I have to say that this one takes the cake. Thank you all!

name:Gâ€uâ€eâ€sâ€tâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:Premier Room (2 beds)
info:Stayed in May 2024
info:Family
info:3 Reviews
rating:3.7
posted:Posted May 23, 2024
msg:Let me start with the good things: the hotel is very clean. Although it is a bit old, it can be seen that it is carefully maintained. The cleaning lady is very kind, and most of the service staff are very polite, which is the consistent excellent standard of InterContinental.
Let's talk about the most disgusting thing: when we checked in, an "experienced" front desk received us and arranged a "special" room for us. I didn't know the situation at the time and I thanked her enthusiastically. Unexpectedly, the nigh**are of four days and three nights began...
This is a room separated from the next room by only one door, and the sound insulation is 0. We can clearly hear any conversation in the next room, so we try not to make any noise in the room to avoid disturbing the next door.
As a result, on the second day, the neighbor next door moved in with a more emotional mood. He kept speaking impassionedly and angrily expressing his opinions on various attractions. He kept talking during our nap and until two o'clock in the morning. He couldn't stop until we called to complain. We completely lost sleep, and we were tired and in a bad mood when visiting attractions during the day.
On the third day, the hotel sent us a fruit plate after we complained. The excited neighbor next door was replaced with a more gentle guest after checking out, but we could still hear each other's whispers. At night, the neighbor coughed, and we felt like we were in the same space.
It is worth thinking whether such a room is suitable for family customers or for high-rise customers. I think if there is a next time, I will definitely not make such a choice again.
----------------------------------------

info:8 Reviews

posted:Posted May 25, 2024
msg:It was my first time staying at the Regent Hotel Beijing. I was very satisfied. I will choose Regent again next time I come to Beijing because it is so comfortable. I did a lot of homework online before coming to Beijing, and finally chose Regent. It turned out that the choice was very correct. The location of Regent Hotel is excellent. It is right next to Dengshikou subway station, which is convenient for going everywhere. The hotel lobby is grand and luxurious, accompanied by piano music, which made us feel very satisfied as soon as we entered the door. As for the service, every waiter I met was polite and kind, and the service was proactive and enthusiastic. I especially praised a gentleman named Zhang Shaohua. The hotel room was clean and tidy, and I was very satisfied. Our package included a meal at the Italian restaurant De Carbo on the second floor. The environment was comfortable, the service was polite, and the taste was very good. It is recommended.

name:Bâ€uâ€aâ€iâ€lâ€aâ€oâ€hâ€uâ€yâ€oâ€u
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in May 2024
info:Solo travelers
info:24 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted May 11, 2024
msg:It was my first time staying at Regent Beijing. I stayed there for two days. The hotel facilities are indeed a bit old, but I was satisfied with the service, from the welcome to open the car door, the front desk check-in upgrade, the room do not disturb, the room cleaning service, the midnight snack at 3 o'clock, the welcome fruit, the daily free drinks in the mini bar, the lobby bar food, these service details are difficult to be fully achieved by many hotels of the same level, but Regent has done them all. Of course, there are some minor flaws, such as the water pressure in the shower room of the room is not strong enough, the TV channels are few and the signal is not good and cannot be rotated, but they are all acceptable. The arrogant and perfunctory attitude of the steak house operator made me decide to eat at the lobby bar. However, the flaws do not outweigh the merits. Next time I come to Wangfujing, I will stay at Regent again.

msg:The first sight when the car came down was very impressive. The Aston Martin showroom was on the first floor. The staff at the door came over to help open the door and take the luggage. There were people picking us up and escorting us to the front desk. ï¿¼
The lobby smelled fragrant when we entered it. There were many staff members. Although some of the staff at the door were a little older, they were really energetic and attentive.
Because of the holidays, I wanted to stay in a suite. There were too many hotels around. This one was definitely the most cost-effective. After a moment of hesitation, the suite was gone, but it was enough for a family of three. The room was cleaned very cleanly and the shower water was also very large. This is really important when staying in a hotel. The only shortcoming was that the bed and pillow were a little soft. I didn't know that the hotel had a variety of pillows to choose from. I didn't know until I checked out. The service staff on the floor were also very serious. They would say hello every time they passed by and ask if there were any clothes that needed to be washed. They were really thoughtful.
There are many snacks around the hotel. It is also very close to Wangfujing. There are subways and buses. It is really convenient. There are also various well-known alleys and old Beijing courtyards. You can spend a day or two strolling around.
All in all, I was very satisfied with this stay!

msg:I chose the hotel because it has its own subway entrance for easy travel. I thought the hotel also has a direct airport bus connection (I found out after asking about the epidemic that the epidemic stopped a few years ago). If you take a taxi to the hotel, the concierge and hotel front desk will provide good service, and the room layout is OK. The heating is OK, and the room and floor have a wide view; the cleaning lady provides enough water and drinks every day. It takes about 20 minutes to walk from the hotel to the Forbidden City (the Forbidden City area is closed and buses do not stop). To watch the flag-raising, you can take the subway Dengshikou C and transfer to Line 1, get off at Wangfujing, and walk to the square for about 10 minutes (No. 1 before and after the flag-raising time) The subway does not stop to drop off passengers at Tiananmen Station, and the subway can only be used one hour after the flag-raising time). There are many hotels of different levels and prices around the hotel, as well as many commercial centers. Wangfujing Macau Center Intime APM is not far away. There are many dining options and there is a queue for meals... The overall impression of Regent this time was okay, not as bad as the low-scoring reviews I saw before said.

At the same time, the sound insulation of the room is slightly insufficient. It is recommended to work on the sound insulation during the next renovation. There is only one small flaw, but everything else is perfect. I recommend everyone to book this hotel and be sure to book the executive floor.

name:Gâ€uâ€eâ€sâ€tâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:Premier Room (Double bed)
info:Stayed in October 2023
info:Couples
info:13 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted October 23, 2023
msg:I deliberately chose a weekend in late autumn to come to Beijing to experience the "autumn in the old capital" described in the book. After several comparisons, I finally chose the Regent Hotel and stayed there for two days. Let me briefly talk about my experience of staying at the hotel and give it as a reference for future travelers:
1. The hotel is in an excellent location. After exiting the Dengshikou subway station, walk two steps to the left and you will reach the main entrance. I even wondered if the subway passed downstairs of the hotel. In a big city like Beijing, you must choose a hotel close to the subway entrance. It is really convenient.
2. The hotel service facilities are first-rate, the staff are well-trained, the rooms are clean and hygienic, the space is sufficient, and the bedding is comfortable and soft. A light sleeper like me can fall asleep easily.
3. I stayed in a room on the 18th floor. The view was very good. I could see far out the floor-to-ceiling window. Itâ€™s just that the price of 2,000+ per night is a bit expensive. It would be better if it could be a little more friendly to the people. In addition, the soundproofing of the room is not very good. You can hear the sound of a father scolding his child in the next room at night. Fortunately, it didn't last too late or too long.
4. The hotel buffet is priced at 288 yuan per person, which I personally feel is not cost-effective. I regret a little bit that I ordered the one with double breakfast. The dishes are relatively rich, but I really donâ€™t think any of the dishes are particularly delicious.
5. A special reminder to Ctrip friends that Ctrip members do not have the right to delay check-out, only InterContinental members have the right.
Finally, Beijing is really crowded with people. There are people everywhere you go.

The location of Regent is quiet in the bustle, but it is also very easy to find at the intersection. If the price per night is usually around 1,000, More is still okay. The price during the National Day holiday was more than 2,000 yuan. The original reservation for three nights without breakfast was more than 6,000 yuan. Because our child is 12 years old and we want an extra bed, the front desk recommended us to upgrade to a suite when we checked in. We received breakfast for three days and an extra bed for free. If the plan was feasible, we upgraded.
        2. In terms of room hardware: The two bedrooms and two bathrooms in the suite are enough for three people. If two mother and son pairs of close friends are traveling together, this room choice is also a good value for money, because living together will be lively. The room has large floor-to-ceiling glass windows and no balcony. It has sufficient lighting and slightly poor ventilation (negligible). The bathroom equipment is a bit old. The toilet flip is not damped. It makes a loud sound when it is flipped down. It makes people jump every time. The large bathroom sink does not drain. It's relaxing, but very big. There is a comfortable pool where my son can take a comfortable bath and watch TV. It's a great way to relieve fatigue.
        Finally, I would like to praise the staff service. From the entrance to the front desk reception to the housekeeping aunt, everyone is very friendly, professional and polite. There are many types of breakfast area, and there is also a special food area for Xiaobao, which is very humane. We were going to the Great Wall the next day and it was relatively early at 7 o'clock. The front desk reminded us that we could pack breakfast. Overall rating: 9 points. (If the bathroom is upgraded with a washlet, I will be very satisfied).
----------------------------------------

name:Aâ€nâ€oâ€nâ€yâ€mâ€oâ€uâ€sâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in July 2023
info:Family
info:2 Reviews
rating:4.2
posted:Posted August 4, 2023
msg:Service: I am satisfied with the front desk. I have upgraded to a privilege room, and I can enjoy afternoon tea and dinner in the executive lounge. I am satisfied with the afternoon tea drinks, but the food and snacks are not very good. There are very few varieties and the taste is average. It is incomparable with the afternoon tea in the executive lounge of the same level. The price is expensive.

The service of the room logistics depar**ent is still very considerate, and the items needed can be met as much as possible.

Hardware facilities: I am very dissatisfied. It says that the room is 45 square meters.

The overall hardware lacks humanization and comfort in design. Now this kind of simple luxury that is not considered by people is outdated.

First, the sound insulation of the room is poor. At night, the neighbor next door can hear the phone calls clearly, and even sings, which woke up the children.

Second, there is no clothesline. After swimming, there is no place to hang the swimsuit. The waiter said that it can be hung on the doorknob. The water dripped all over the floor, so how to dry it.

Third, there is no trash can in the bathroom, and there is no place to put your mobile phone. There is no place to put your mobile phone in the bathroom. Throwing paper into the toilet is easy to drain slowly. Because the room is small and the bathroom space is small, you can't put anything there. You can tell that the room is small.

Fourth, the sewer in the shower room was blocked and overflowed, and it was repaired later. The sewer hole is very large, and the water makes a huge sound of flowing water like a waterfall. The child goes to bed early. I am worried that it will disturb the child. I put the reminder card next to the water outlet and the water flows The sound became smaller.

The overall feeling is that 2,000 yuan a night is not worth the price at all. I stayed for three nights in a row and will not come again. The price of this hotel is too low, I really don't recommend it.

  Happy hour, there is no problem with being full, but the variety is quite small, so you can eat whatever you want.

  The buffet breakfast is also quite rich in varieties, and the service is very good. There is a waiter at the entrance of the restaurant to greet you with a smile and polite words throughout the process. When we finished eating and went out to the door, the waiter greeted us warmly

posted:Posted December 17, 2023
msg:Every time I stay at Regent, I always come and go in a hurry, and I donâ€™t have time to evaluate it. This time I will write a short essay to evaluate it. Regent Hotel is an old hotel. Although it opened early, it is well maintained. I like the location very much. It's a very advantageous location. The transportation is convenient and travel is convenient. I give it high marks for this. The hotel lobby is magnificent and very stylish. What I like most is to sit in the lobby bar all afternoon and listen to the piano in a daze. This time I stayed in a twin room and a suite. The suite size was up to standard, the facilities were good, the bedding was very comfortable, the room service was great, the response was positive and fast, the welcome fruits were in season, and there were different varieties every time I stayed. However, if you can cover it with plastic wrap after cleaning, the details will be extra points. The mattress in the twin room seems to be a bit old. It creaks when you turn over and is not very stable. It seems to be a bit drifting when you sleep on it. Walking through the hotel, the staff you encounter are all polite and smiling, making you feel at home. The staff at the concierge depar**ent in the lobby are also enthusiastic and answer all questions. During this stay, I also experienced a small incident: It happened to be a snowy day in Beijing, and I ordered a steaming takeout, but the takeout was not allowed in. I very much understand the hotelâ€™s intentions, but if the hotel doorman can proactively inform the takeaway staff and contact the guests, the hotel can definitely help deliver it to the room, so that a steaming hot takeout food will not be left outside the lobby in minus ten degrees Celsius weather. It was placed in the open air, and by the time you got it, it was already freezing cold, making it completely inedible. Although I gave a tip later and asked the staff to help deliver it to the room, the service was still lacking in details and needed to be improved. The hotel's breakfast buffet is not outstanding, with a relatively single variety and a lack of Beijing specialty foods. There is no rice noodle stall at the Ming Dang Noodle stall if you want to take a bite. The products produced by Bai An do not look good and feel a bit unsuitable for the price of breakfast. The whole stay was quite pleasant, Regent will always be ranked first in my heart! Will stay here next time!

name:Aâ€aâ€nâ€bâ€oâ€Z
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in May 2023
info:Solo travelers
info:13 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted May 29, 2023
msg:Booked a luxurious suite, the front desk upgraded the suite for free, staying for two days was very comfortable
I have stayed in almost all luxury hotels in Beijing. This time I wanted to stay in the executive room of InterContinental Sanlitun, but it was 520, so I was not sure. After a round of choices, Regent's afternoon tea attracted me. After all, the room was much cheaper, so I didn't have much expectations, but from the time I checked in to when I left, it was amazing.
The toiletries in the room are very useful. When I checked in at 8 o'clock, the turndown bed was already turned on, and the bathroom floor was covered with floor towels. The room was well equipped and cleaned very clean. The minibar is free for the first time.
The sound insulation is good and needs to be strengthened. The pillow menu is very complete. There are lavender pillows. I am happy~
The hotel's service attitude is very good. The doorman is very winking. He takes the initiative to drive the door to carry the suitcase and bag, and politely introduces it to the room. Warm service at all times.
I went down to get takeout, and the hotel management (three Europeans) were standing by the door chattering, and I heard them saying "yeah we should do more to please our guests". They are not condescending, and what they are talking about is also the idea of serving customers. This is the attitude that the service industry should have!
The waitresses at breakfast were very enthusiastic, they helped press the elevator and guided them to their seats. My throat was uncomfortable. The waitress noticed it at breakfast on the first day and offered to give me freshly squeezed pear juice. The next day she still remembered that my throat was uncomfortable, so she took the initiative to bring pear juice, and took the initiative to pack a glass. Really warm but not overdone, comfortable without being intrusive.
The breakfast at the hotel is delicious, the cream cheese is great, there are all kinds of eggs (poached eggs benedict, scrambled eggs and omelettes) I am really happy, the breakfast quality is also very good, the yogurt small bottles are very fresh, vegetables tasty.
Due to temporary errands, I didn't have afternoon tea at Regent. It's a pity that I will fly from Beijing to Singapore in July. I will definitely come to Regent again to try the famous afternoon tea.

posted:Posted April 17, 2023
msg:Location determines price. The hotel opened in 2007, took advantage of the price drop on weekends, and experienced it. Booked a basic room type without breakfast. Facilities: There is a swimming pool, gym, sauna and steam room. The brand of the treadmill is Technogym. The gym is outside, and there are a lot of people. The paint on the bedside cabinets and office chairs in the guest room is very obvious. This has been mentioned in many reviews. I hope the hotel can pay attention to the update of the facilities. The bathroom scale was broken when we checked in. The water pressure of the shower is obviously not enough, and the two water pressures are very low if they are turned on together. The TV is still more than ten years ago, so it is not worth seeing. Hygiene: The water quality of the swimming pool is not very good. After swimming, the skin feels dry and tight, and I am a little allergic. Environment: It's pretty good. Exit C of Dengshikou Subway Station is the city center. It's convenient to go anywhere. Service: This is really...it's called mineral water delivery, and it takes 10 minutes to arrive. When I checked in, I didn't take the initiative to ask if I needed a razor. The room supplies were delivered after hanging up the phone for a while. Welcome fruit gift: I saw that the fruit sent by the waiter has different styles. I only have 3 apples. I hope there are more varieties.

name:Gâ€uâ€eâ€sâ€tâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:2 Twin Beds Classic
info:Stayed in February 2023
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:4.5
posted:Posted February 13, 2023
msg:I haven't traveled for three years, and I chose Beijing for the first match. The most important link and the biggest expense in the travel process should be the choice of hotel. Because I decided to come to Beijing temporarily, the hotel was booked late. After many considerations, I chose Beijing Regent Hotel. It is next to the subway station and it is convenient to travel. I thought that the high-end brand under InterContinental would not step on thunder. I stayed for four days, including two meals. The total cost of the lunch and dinner set and daily breakfast for two is 5,800 yuan. There is still something to say about the overall experience.
Disadvantages: 1. It was around 3:00 pm when I checked in. The front desk told me that the room hadn't been cleaned yet and I had to wait for 1-2 hours. If I needed to get the room immediately, I suggested that I pay to upgrade the room type. When it reached more than 400 yuan per day, I refused. If I considered the budget of about 2,000 yuan, I would directly book the Peninsula or Waldorf Astoria Hotel. The upgraded room type does not enjoy administrative benefits, and there are only double-bed rooms and no twin-bed rooms. Me and It was inconvenient for my son to check in, so the front desk asked me to sit and wait, which made my first experience very bad.
2. When I came back at night and got the room, there was no welcome fruit on the first day, no napkins in the room, only half a box of tissues on the sink in the bathroom, I needed to call to have the fruit and tissues delivered, and there was no trash can in the toilet, which was very inconvenient to use. I see that many people mentioned the disadvantages on the Internet, but the hotel is not willing to improve. When checking out, the front desk asked about any deficiencies. After telling them, the front desk replied that they would prepare some tissues for me next time I check in. Actually, this is not my personal need, it is all The basic needs of residents, who lives in a five-star hotel will bring their own napkins?
3. My set meal includes breakfast for two people. When I went to have breakfast two days ago, I was told by the food and beverage depar**ent that there was only one breakfast for one person. On the first day, I told them to verify it. On the second day, I still said that I only had one. When I told When it was two copies, the waiter who swiped the card in the food and beverage depar**ent told me that I should contact the front desk to modify it. This should be something that the two depar**ents of the hotel can directly verify and modify. It is really not professional enough to let the guests modify it by themselves. When I went to the front desk to inquire, the front desk said that there was no problem with the computer system records, and she would contact the food and beverage depar**ent, and finally did not question my meal count on the third day.
Advantages: 1. The hotel is still convenient to travel. Metro Line 5 is next to the hotel, and it can be reached within a 5-minute walk.
2. Most of the service attitudes of the hotel concierge, front desk, and food and beverage depar**ent are very kind. I hope to live a little higher, and the front desk is also satisfied. The floor-to-ceiling windows have a very good view.
3. The dinner set included in the package gave me an unexpected surprise, it was very delicious. I wasn't originally a fan of lasagne bolognese, but Dekabo's lasagne was so rich that it was worth a try. Desserts are also very good. My son changed the lobster pasta for extra money, and the lobster was also very fresh. The restaurant is not big, and the seats need to be reserved in advance. However, due to changes in my itinerary, I need to eat temporarily. The restaurant also helped me make adjus**ents to meet my needs. Thank you very much.
4. On the first day of staying in the hotel, I found that there was no clean hair on the edge of the sink. Because I have a slight cleanliness addiction, I felt uncomfortable. The next day, I went back to the room and found that the room was very clean. Even if I have a cleanliness, I can't fault it. I must give it a thumbs up. I stayed for four days in total, and the room cleaning was basically satisfactory.
5. The hotel is very generous with drinking water. Seven or eight bottles are placed every day. Beijing is dry, which is very necessary. There is coffee capsules in the room but I didn't use it, I drank coffee at breakfast every day. There are Coke, orange juice and beer in the freezer, which are also free to drink. Although I don't drink these, the experience for the guests is very good.
6. The hotel's breakfast is also okay. Although my son feels that there are not many varieties, I think it is basically enough. Except for the oolong incident of swiping the card at the entrance of the restaurant two days ago, which made me unhappy, the service staff of other restaurants are very proactive and kind.
If the hotel can improve the details, it should get better and better!

msg:I stayed at this hotel on New Year's Eve, and the overall feeling is okay.
The best thing is probably the service. From the doorman outside the hotel to the reception in the lobby, to the service staff on the floor, the cordial greetings and smiling service make people warm and decent.
I seem to have a little problem with the welcome ceremony. Desserts are very satisfying for children, but apples make it difficult for me, a clean freak. The meaning of apple is very good, peace! But in the absence of tools, it is a bit embarrassing to gnaw with the skin. Can it be replaced with seasonal fruits that can be easily peeled? Or is it processed a little to make a small fruit plate? Of course, this is just my selfish idea from the perspective of a consumer. Please forgive me if I add trouble to the hotel kitchen.
The room as a whole is compact, and I appreciate the design of the bay window. A window that can be opened is designed with a concave, ğŸ”›Window while standing by the window, the view is wide and it will not affect the neighbors, and it can also protect privacy. nice! ğŸ›It's very comfortable, but it's a pity that there are no simple bathing supplies. In fact, preparing some bath balls, bath salts, essential oil waxes and other supplies during the festival (accept payment form) may make the accommodation more quality and guests more Belonging. Fortunately, the bedding makes up for this shortcoming. From the pillow to the quilt to the mattress, the cleanliness is very satisfactory! It didn't make me uncomfortable at all, it was soft, comfortable and breathable. give it a like! The only unsatisfactory thing in the room is probably the big wardrobe and the carpet. Probably because of the long time? The switch sound of the large wardrobe is relatively obvious, and it cannot be completely closed. The lighting in the cabinet will always be on, which is a bit scary at night. The carpet is too old and looks dirty.
Finally, let's talk about breakfast! In addition to the low temperature of the dining environment (but the location outside the restaurant seems to be warmer, I can give a good review! There are many types, fresh ingredients, and freshly ground coffee is pleasant and tastes good! There is also a very familiar Beijing dialect! Kind!
Thanks again for the reception and companionship of the hotel on the last day of 2022 and the first day of 2023, and thank you for your hard work.

name:Gâ€uâ€eâ€sâ€tâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in October 2022
info:Friends
info:7 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted October 11, 2022
msg:Lijing has a first-class location. It is a five-minute walk to Wangfujing Pedestrian Street, less than 100 meters from Union Hospital, and within three kilometers by car from the gates of Tiananmen, Qianmen, the Forbidden City, Jingshan, and Beijing Sea. The hotel lobby is beautifully decorated, and a whole wall of transparent glass on the rear facade integrates the back garden with the lobby. The room is large and comfortable, with a shower room and a bathtub, and each room is also equipped with a coffee machine. When I checked in, Tian Ranran at the front desk quickly checked in and told me that if I had any problems during my stay, I could find her at any time, and also sent us to the elevator, which was very warm. I continued my stay for five days in total, and I received warm and professional service from the front desk Yang Jiayu, Zhao Yuxin, and Li Caili when I went through the renewal procedures. The hotel room service staff turned up the shower pressure at my request. Probably seeing that we drank all 5 bottles of drinking water every day, the housekeeping staff automatically added 2 more bottles of drinking water for me from the third day. Also automatically added a cool clothes rack to my brother's room. Also, Lijing has a wide variety of breakfast options, including Chinese and Western styles for you to eat. In short, Regent Hotel has super five-star service, first-class hardware and first-class environment. I've stayed here since the second year of Regent's opening, and I've stayed here every time I come to Beijing since then. I found that the service of the sprinkle shop is constantly improving, which is surprising.

msg:Although there are not many pictures, I still want to recommend the hotel to everyone. I couldn't go out to Beijing during the National Day, so my child chose it if they wanted to swim. It was the first time I stayed at the Regent Hotel and I was very satisfied. The service staff from the doorman to the lobby to the restaurant to the service staff are very enthusiastic and have a good attitude. We were upgraded to a high-floor viewing room, early check-in and late check-out, and gifts such as drinks and fruits were given before we left. The room is clean and tidy, the hot water is very good, the swimming pool is great, there are three pools, a 35-degree hot spring constant temperature small swimming pool for women and children, a large swimming pool of 28 degrees, not many people, service ğŸ‘Œ. Although the breakfast is not comparable to the varieties of hotels in the south, it is very good in Beijing. The chef personally delivered the new snacks recommended for the day for the guests to taste. The weather cooled down, and the waiter specially poured ginger tea for the guests, which was very heart-warming. The doorman greets the guests whenever they see them and helps them with their luggage. In a word, the service is satisfactory and the environment is satisfactory. I will come again when I have time next time. I wish the hotel management will continue to be better and better?

info:12 Reviews
rating:4.5
posted:Posted March 11, 2023
msg:The location of Beijing Regent Hotel is very good. The Dengshikou Station of Line 5 is just downstairs, and it is only 10 minutes' walk from Wangfujing Yintai in77. It is very convenient to go everywhere.
We stayed for two consecutive days, and the front desk took the initiative to upgrade the service. The service staff in the lobby were very enthusiastic and cleaned in a timely manner.
The room is on the 15th floor and you can directly see the Forbidden City, which is unexpected.
But to mention areas for improvement:
1. At the time of booking, the Ctrip order shows that the welcome fruit for the first night is given, but I have not received it.
2. Only the toilet has a napkin box in the room, but it is not seen in other places, which is not convenient.
3. Only one bedside table has a socket, and there is no socket on the other side, which is inconvenient to charge.

rating:2.5
posted:Posted February 12, 2023
msg:The first time I went to Beijing, I chose the Regent Hotel, and I had high expectations. But I feel more disappointed in the following points.
1. The hotel swimming pool is unhygienic. On the first day I went swimming, I developed skin allergies at night and developed small red bumps on my neck.
2. The hotel service is stiff and does not know how to adapt. After staying for three nights, I came back from a trip around the world one night and was very hungry. I wanted to ask the hotel to heat up the roast duck I bought outside at noon the day before, but I was refused. Said the hotel could not help heat take-out food. I'm quite angry about this. I stayed for three nights and refused to even lend me a microwave, probably because I was afraid something would happen.
3. Breakfast was disappointing. There are many comments on Ctrip about how good the hotel breakfast is. They are really fake. In the morning, the baking area was full of croissants, the wontons and noodles were all skinned, and there was basically nothing else delicious. You had to ask the waiter for coffee, it was very weak, probably watered down like 711.
Overall disappointing, I won't come back again. It's not as good as Heping Hotel in a good location, but its price is one-third of yours!

name:Gâ€uâ€eâ€sâ€tâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in February 2022
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted February 10, 2022
msg:Gather with your best friend and baby
Main purpose: Relax and let the kids who can't swim enjoy swimming
The five-star era of Wangfujing has been around for a long time.
Only Regent's pools are the friendliest for non-swimmers
45cm deep, 29 degrees constant temperature, independent area
meet our main needs

The price of 1190 with double breakfast is also acceptable
Self-service a la carte breakfast surprised us during the epidemic
Exquisite, beautiful, delicious and online at the same time, especially value-for-money
Free for babies under 6 years old, half price for 6 to how much (forgive me for forgetting)

Let's talk service
Our housekeeper is Sister Jia, who is friendly, thoughtful, patient, listens very well, and can be satisfied as you wish. I am very happy, thank you Sister Jia.
We also prepared lovely chocolate and anti-humid lung appetizer tea for us.

Register as an InterContinental member and you can also get two cups of welcome benefits
Two drinks in the lobby bar (choose watermelon juice and coffee)
Room fruit (three apples, not eaten)

If you look closely, the room facilities are indeed a bit outdated. For example, the shower head of the bathtub in our room will flow from the side when using it. The waterproof platform in the bathroom is also cracked and repaired. There is also a TV... a Samsung that is very small and not very clear...

There are plenty of bottled water in the room, two cans of Coke, two Tsingtao beers and two bottles of orange juice are provided in the minibar. There are also capsule coffee and tea bags.
We all switched to orange juice.

However, after all, it is 20 years old, and it is still okay to maintain it like this. Our main purpose is swimming. This one is satisfied, and the others can be ignored.

Then the breakfast is really goodğŸ‘ Feeling again

In addition, Ctrip booked one, and the other one can only be guaranteed by Ctrip for hotel payment, 2500 credit card at the store, and refunded the next day. The beauties at the front desk are also very warm and friendly, and they even gave their sons cute bears. Now the sons sleep every day.

Thank you friends for listening to me, I hope it helps you.

There is a large swimming pool, a childrenâ€™s pool, and a pool with a temperature of 40 degrees. There are saunas in the menâ€™s and womenâ€™s locker rooms for steaming and separate hot and cold water pools. I decided to swim in the hot water in the afternoon. In addition, the gym and a mirrored aerobics room (dance room) are also on the fifth floor. When you go to the swimming pool, you will pass through these two separate large rooms first. It feels very thoughtful and considerate. Mr. Yuan Wenqing, who is in charge of the fifth floor, has great service and delivered them promptly after we swim. With fruit and water... Suddenly, I gave this hotel a big bonus, and I must add more points! And the hotel bed is very comfortable, the mattress is not very soft, the more tired you sleep, it can be compared with the tens of thousands of mattresses in our house. Although the room facilities are a bit outdated, the hygiene is good. My skin is very sensitive. So I was terrified at first when I saw a carpet prone to accumulate mites in the room, but after a few days of sleep, I didnâ€™t have itchy skin. Ah, I would like to thank the eldest sister (sixth floor) who has been helping us to clean the room these days. She is very serious and responsible for her work! In addition, the hotel has welcome fruits on the first day, and the drinks in the small refrigerator are free on the first day. There are anti-epidemic supplies, masks and disinfection wipes every day. The breakfast restaurant will also prepare masks for guests to use. I specifically asked the hotel for a simple folding drying rack... In short, the above series of personal experience and feelings made me a little reluctant to leave this hotel after staying for five nights. The a little outdated facilities are nothing at all. â¤ï¸ I should stay here again when I come to Beijing. name:Gâ€uâ€eâ€sâ€tâ€ â€Uâ€sâ€eâ€r
info:1 King Bed Classic
info:Stayed in July 2021
info:Other
info:1 Review
rating:1
posted:Posted August 8, 2021
msg:Regent Hotel hardware and software are very poor. 1. Hardware: The breakfast is not good, like the breakfast in a high-end business hotel, the venue is small, the variety is small, and there is no yogurt. The lobby pool in the public area is not bad, which is worth affirming. However, the hygiene in the room is not to be praised. After all, it is a place to sleep. There is a sour and musty smell when entering the room, and I want a non-smoking room. The shower has the hair of the previous guest. . . A little nauseated. Too many people during summer vacation? I didn't change rooms after staying for one night, I think it might be the same. 2. In terms of software: I personally think that the hygiene issue just mentioned is a management issue. There is an angry thing is, one o'clock in the middle of the night! At one o'clock in the middle of the night, the sleeping guests were woken up. First call my mobile phone, then call the room, let me go to register and make up the deposit! ! I guaranteed the payment in full, but harassed me at midnight and asked me to make up the deposit in the middle of the night? Later, the hotel explained to me that they called me to make sure I was there. Call me in the middle of the night to make sure I have arrived at the store? ? My mother is not as "worry about me" as you are. Ridiculously loose management without knowing it! It is hard to imagine how to ensure hygiene and food safety under such management? ! Think about it and feel scared.

äº‹å¯¦ä¸Šï¼ŒåŒ—äº¬éº—æ™¶å·²ç¶“ä½è†©äº†ï¼Œå³ä¾¿æ˜¯æ²’è¢«æ´²éš›é›†åœ˜æ”¶ç·¨å‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿä½éNå¤šæ¬¡äº†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œç¾åœ¨ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸»å‹•å»ä½ï¼Œå…¶å¯¦æ˜¯æä¸èµ·èˆˆè¶£çš„ã€‚é€™æ¬¡ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥ä½ï¼Œæ˜¯é…’åº—å¤§å ‚å§æ¨å‡ºäº†â€œå¡çˆ¾.æ‹‰æ ¼æ–â€è¯åä¸‹åˆèŒ¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¸¶è€å©†å’Œå€†å…’å­ç‰¹æ„å†å»æ‰“å¡ä½ä¸€éï¼Œç•¢ç«Ÿï¼Œè€ä½›çˆºåœ¨æ™‚å°šç•Œçš„é‡‘å­—å¡”åœ°ä½ï¼Œå°±æœ‰é»å…’é¡ä¼¼æ–¼åˆ‡.æ ¼ç“¦æ‹‰åœ¨æ–æ»¾æ¨‚è¿·ï¼ˆå„˜ç®¡é¢¨é¦¬ç‰›ä¸ç›¸åŠï¼Œä½†å»æ˜¯æ˜¯å¯¦æ‰“å¯¦çš„ç²¾ç¥åœ–é¨°èˆ‡ä¿¡ä»°æºæ³‰ï¼‰å¿ƒä¸­çš„åœ°ä½ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œæ™‚å°šåœˆçš„å‡±æ’’å¤§å¸ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯é¬§è‘—ç©å…’çš„ï¼Œæ›´ä¸æ˜¯æµªå¾—è™›åï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œå³ä¾¿ä»™é€å·²ä¹…ï¼Œä»–çš„ç›¸é—œæ–°èæˆ–æ•…äº‹ï¼Œä»½é‡ä¾èˆŠèˆ‰è¶³è¼•é‡ã€‚æ­¤è¯åä¸‹åˆèŒ¶æœƒä¸€ç›´æŒçºŒåˆ°å¹´åº•ï¼Œç”œé»æ¥µå…¶è±å¯Œï¼Œç‰¹åˆ¥é©åˆå°ç›†å‹ã€‚å¤§å ‚å§é‚„ç‰¹æ„æº–å‚™äº†ä¸€å¼µå°ˆå±¬é»‘æ¡Œå­ï¼Œæ¡Œé¢æ˜¯å¡çˆ¾.æ‹‰æ ¼æ–ç¶“å…¸é ­åƒç‰ˆç•«ï¼Œæ¦®è­½æ„Ÿå’Œè‡ªè±ªæ„Ÿåè¶³ã€‚ä¸‹åˆèŒ¶åˆ†ç‚º888å’Œ1888å…©ç¨®ï¼Œå€åˆ¥åœ¨æ–¼æœ‰æ²’æœ‰å·´é»ä¹‹èŠ±é¦™æª³ï¼Œå¾Œè€…å…¶å¯¦æ›´é©åˆæˆ€äººå°é…Œæ€¡æƒ…ã€‚é…’åº—å¾ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹ï¼Œå¹¾ä¹ç„¡ä¸€äººç­è§£æ´²éš›é…’åº—â€œå„ªæ‹â€é€™ä»¶äº‹å…’ï¼Œç„¡è«–æ˜¯ä¸­å±¤ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆè­¬å¦‚å¤§å ‚å§åŠ‰ç¶“ç†ç­‰ï¼‰é‚„æ˜¯åŸºå±¤å“¡å·¥ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€è‡‰æ‡µï¼Œæ—¢ä¸çŸ¥é“æ€éº¼æ ¸éŠ·ï¼ˆé€™å®¶é…’åº—99%çš„å“¡å·¥éƒ½æ˜¯ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡çŸ¥é“â€œå„ªæ‹â€é€™ä»¶äº‹å…’ï¼Œå¤©å•Šï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸çŸ¥é“æ€éº¼æ“ä½œï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚å·´é»ä¹‹èŠ±æ˜¯çµ¦ä¸€ç“¶é‚„æ˜¯çµ¦ä¸€æ¯ç­‰ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ›´ä¸çŸ¥é“æ€éº¼æ‡‰å°ï¼Œç¸½ä¹‹ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç¨®ä¸€å•ä¸‰ä¸çŸ¥çš„ç‹€æ…‹ã€‚çœ‹èµ·ä¾†ï¼Œé‚„æ˜¯è¦åŠ å¼·å’Œé›†åœ˜å±¤é¢çš„æºé€šå”èª¿ï¼Œæ›´é‡è¦çš„é‚„æ˜¯å“¡å·¥åŸ¹è¨“ï¼Œé›†åœ˜æ–¹æ–¹é¢é¢çš„å†·çŸ¥è­˜éƒ½è©²ä¿¡æ‰‹æ‹ˆä¾†æ‰å°ã€‚Â  Â  Â  

é…’åº—åœ°ç†ä½ç½®å¥½åˆ°æ¥µé»ï¼Œå¯¸åœŸå¯¸é‘½çŸ³ï¼Œåœ°éµç‡ˆå¸‚å£ç«™ç‚ºé…’åº—å–®ç¨é–‹äº†å€‹å£å…’ï¼Œæ‚¨ç§é€™é¢å­å¤šå¤§ã€‚é…’åº—æ–œå°é¢éä¸€å€‹è·¯å£å°±æ˜¯æˆ‘å€†å…’å­çš„å­¸æ ¡â€”â€”åŒ—äº¬æ™¯å±±å­¸æ ¡ï¼Œæ”¾äº†å­¸èµ°éä¾†å³å¯ã€‚ä»¥å‰ï¼Œå€†å…’å­é‚„å°æ™‚ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯åœ¨é…’åº—ä¿±æ¨‚éƒ¨ï¼ˆè¡Œæ”¿é…’å»Šï¼‰åƒå®Œæ—©é¤ï¼Œç›´æ¥ä¸‹æ¨“æ­¥è¡Œå»æ¾³é–€ä¸­å¿ƒä¸Šè‹±æ–‡èª²ï¼Œä¸€åˆ‡éƒ½è¿‘åœ¨å’«å°ºï¼ˆè©±èª¬ï¼Œä»–å€‘å®¶é ‚å±¤ä¿±æ¨‚éƒ¨æŒ‘é«˜æ˜¯çœŸçš„é«˜ï¼Œè¦è¶…éåŒ—äº¬è¯å½¬è²»çˆ¾è’™çš„é…’å»ŠæŒ‘é«˜ï¼Œå°‡é‡‘å¯¶è¡—çš„ç¹è¯ç›¡æ”¶çœ¼åº•ï¼‰ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œè¡¹è¦åŒ—äº¬æœ‰å•¥é¢¨å¹è‰å‹•ã€å¤§äº‹å°æƒ…ï¼ˆè³½äº‹ã€æ´»å‹•ã€æœƒè­°â€¦â€¦ï¼‰ï¼Œé…’åº—å°±æœƒè¿…å³æ»¿æˆ¿ï¼Œç”šè‡³è¢«å¾µç”¨ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œä¸€ä¸é»å…’éƒ½ä¸æ„å®¢æµå’Œç›ˆåˆ©ï¼Œåœ¨åŒ—äº¬éº—æ™¶é‚‚é€…æ˜æ˜Ÿè—äººè¦å®¢ç­‰ç­‰ï¼Œé‚£æ˜¯å¸¸æœ‰çš„äº‹å…’ã€‚é€™æ¬¡ç ´å¤©è’ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡æ²’çµ¦æˆ‘å‡ç´šå¥—æˆ¿ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ²’çµ¦è¡Œæ”¿å¾…é‡ï¼Œå€†å…’å­å¾ˆè¨ç•°ï¼Œå¹¾ä¹æ˜¯å•¥ä¹Ÿæ²’æœ‰ï¼ˆå…¥ä½æœŸé–“æ­£å¥½è¶•ä¸Šç å¯¶å±•ï¼Œä¹Ÿç¢ºå¯¦å¾ˆé›£æ“ å‡ºæˆ¿é–“ï¼‰ï¼Œæ­¡è¿æ°´æœå’Œæ­¡è¿ç”œå“çš„æ°´æº–è¡¹èƒ½èª¬ä¸€ç›´åœ¨ç·šå§ï¼Œä¸¦æ²’æœ‰é€²éšã€‚é™¤äº†ä½ç½®å¥½å¤–ï¼Œé…’åº—å…¶å®ƒæ–¹é¢ä¹å–„å¯é™³ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ï¼Œç¡¬ä»¶è€èˆŠã€‚ä½†æ˜¯è©±åˆèª¬å›ä¾†ï¼Œé‚£éº¼å¤§é«”é‡çš„é…’åº—ï¼Œé‡æ–°è£ä¿®çš„è©±ï¼Œæœƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç­†å¤©æ–‡æ•¸å­—çš„æ”¯å‡ºï¼Œé¡ä¼¼æ–¼é¦™æ¸¯æ´²éš›çš„é‡æ–°èª¿æ•´ã€‚å…¶å¯¦ï¼Œé€™éƒ½ä¸é‡è¦ï¼Œå› ç‚ºåŒ—äº¬éº—æ™¶çš„ä¸­æ–¹æ¥­ä¸»å¤ªæœ‰å¯¦åŠ›ï¼ŒéŒ¢ä¸æ˜¯å•é¡Œï¼Œé—œéµæ˜¯å¦‚æ­¤é•·çš„ç©ºçª—æœŸï¼Œæœƒå¤±æ‰å¾ˆå¤šå¸‚å ´å’Œæ©Ÿæœƒï¼Œé€™æ˜¯æ¥­ä¸»æ–¹ä¸é¡˜çœ‹åˆ°çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œè£ä¸è£ä¿®ï¼Œé€™æ˜¯ä»¶æ¥µå…¶ç³¾çµçš„äº‹å…’ã€‚Â Â Â Â  Â 

æ—©é¤æ˜¯å¿…é ˆé»è®šçš„ï¼Œæ—©é¤å»³çš„å“¡å·¥å’Œä¸­å±¤é ˜å°ï¼Œä¸€å€‹æ¯”ä¸€å€‹å°ˆæ¥­ï¼Œå¾…äººæ¥ç‰©ä¹Ÿè®“äººè¦ºå¾—å¦‚æ²æ˜¥é¢¨ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ¥è‡ªç„¶ã€é«”è²¼ï¼Œå»ºè­°é…’åº—çš„å…¶å®ƒéƒ¨é–€éƒ½å¤šå­¸å­¸ã€‚é¤å»³æœ‰å°ˆé–€çš„é‘½çŸ³å¤§ä½¿å°ˆå€ï¼Œæ—©ä¸Šå°±æœ‰å„ç¨®æ´‹é…’ä¾›æ‡‰ï¼Œé€™ä¸€é»é‚„æ˜¯å¾ˆç´°å¿ƒå‘¨åˆ°ã€ç‰¹ç«‹ç¨è¡Œçš„ã€‚éº—æ™¶æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹å‘½é‹å¤šèˆ›ï¼ˆä¸€é–‹å§‹åœ¨éº—ç¬™æ——ä¸‹ï¼Œç•¶æ™‚ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰â€œéº—â€å­—è¼©å…’çš„é…’åº—éƒ½æ˜¯ä»–å€‘å®¶çš„ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚éº—ç­ ç­‰ç­‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼Œç•¶æ™‚çš„åŒ—äº¬éº—æ™¶å’Œéº—äº­å…¶å¯¦æ˜¯åŒä¸€é›†åœ˜éº¾ä¸‹çš„é›™å­æ˜Ÿé…’åº—ï¼Œå¾Œä¾†ï¼Œéº—æ™¶æˆäº†å°ç£å•†äººçš„å›Šä¸­ç‰©ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å°åŒ—æ™¶è¯é›†åœ˜ï¼Œå†å¾Œä¾†ï¼Œæ´²éš›å—å¤ äº†éº—æ™¶51%è‚¡ä»½ï¼Œè€Œå¼”è©­çš„æ˜¯ï¼ŒéŒ¦æ±Ÿåˆæ”¶è³¼äº†éº—ç¬™é›†åœ˜ï¼Œå› æ­¤ï¼ŒåŒ—äº¬éº—æ™¶å°é¢çš„è¦ªå¼Ÿå¼Ÿéº—äº­ï¼Œç¾åœ¨å·²ç¶“æ˜¯å¦¥å¦¥çš„ä¸­åœ‹ä¸Šæµ·å“ç‰Œå•¦ï¼Œé›™å­æ˜ŸäºŒè€…å·²ç„¡é—œä¿‚ï¼‰çš„å°çœ¾æ™®å¥¢å“ç‰Œï¼Œåœ¨æ´²éš›é›†åœ˜å…§éƒ¨çš„åœ°ä½ï¼Œç›®å‰åƒ…æ¬¡æ–¼å…­å–„ï¼ˆè·Ÿé«˜å¥¢å“ç‰Œä¸€å¤§å †çš„è¬è±ªæ¯”èµ·ä¾†ï¼Œæ´²éš›åœ¨é«˜ç«¯é ˜åŸŸé‚„éœ€è¦å†å¤šåŠ æŠŠå‹å…’ï¼Œé‚„å¥½ï¼Œæ´²è‡³å¥¢é¸åœ¨æ­å·å·²ç¶“å•Ÿå¹•ï¼Œæœªä¾†ï¼Œé‚„æœƒåœ¨ç¾ŠåŸä½ˆå±€ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å»£å·é¦™åµï¼ŒæœŸå¾…ingï¼‰ã€‚ç›®å‰ï¼Œå…¨çƒä¸€å…±æœ‰9å®¶éº—æ™¶ï¼ˆå³‡é‡Œå³¶éº—æ™¶å°šæœªå•Ÿå¹•ï¼‰ï¼šåº·åŸéº—æ™¶æ˜¯æœ€ä¸åƒéº—æ™¶ã€æœ€æ²’æœ‰éº—æ™¶å…ƒç´ çš„Regentï¼Œç”šè‡³åš´æ ¼æ„ç¾©ä¸Šèª¬ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç®—æ˜¯ä¸€å®¶çœŸæ­£çš„éº—æ™¶ï¼Œæ›´é©åˆè¢«æ­¸ç´åˆ°æ´²è‡³å¥¢é¸å“é¡ä¸­ï¼›æœ€å°çœ¾çš„æ˜¯é»‘å±±éº—æ™¶ï¼›å¯Œåœ‹å³¶éº—æ™¶çš„æ™¯è‰²å·²ç¶“è¶…éäº†è‡ªå®¶çš„å¯Œåœ‹å³¶æ´²éš›ï¼Œå¯æƒœè±ªè¯ç¨‹åº¦å’Œç¿¡ç¿ ç£JWé‚„æ˜¯ç•¥éœä¸€ç±Œï¼›é‡è£å›æ­¸å¾Œçš„é¦™æ¸¯éº—æ™¶é¡¯ç„¶æ˜¯éº—æ™¶é€™å€‹å“ç‰Œç¾åœ¨çš„å¯¦åŠ›å¤©èŠ±æ¿ï¼Œæ˜¯æœ€æ‹¿å¾—å‡ºæ‰‹çš„ï¼›ä¸€ç›´åœ¨ç·šçš„éº—æ™¶æœ‰æŸæ—ã€ä¸Šæµ·ã€é‡æ…¶ï¼›è¼ƒæ™®é€šçš„æ˜¯è¨­è¨ˆæ„Ÿæ¥µå¼·çš„å°åŒ—å’Œä»Šå¤©æ‰€è¿°çš„åŒ—äº¬ã€‚

msg:Hygiene: Not very good. There are dried blood stains on the walls of the bathroom and there is a peculiar smell on the floor.
Facilities: Really too old! ! ! The air conditioner made a rumbling sound, which was intermittent. I couldn't sleep well at night. I turned off the air conditioner to heat it up, but turned it on and it was too noisy. The experience was really bad.
Price: It is recommended that you do not choose a high-rise. The so-called high-rise with extra money is the 10th-11th floor, not the 11th and above floors. You will be asked to add money at the front desk.

Very bad experience
